channel.title: heif on Goofing Osamu
channel.description: Recent content in heif on Goofing Osamu

item.title: Tips for HEIF image files
item.description: High Efficiency Image File Format (HEIF) High Efficiency Image File Format (HEIF) is used by iPhone. Here are tips to cope with HEIF image files on Debian. HEIF to JPEG conversion Let’s install libheif-examples package. $ heif-convert foo.HEIF foo.JPEG Eye of GNOME Image Viewer Let’s install heif-gdk-pixbuf package.
